languages.text: "Только нарушителей Лекс Империалис, их пособников и возможные контакты — их имена, приметы, вероятные логова. Арбитр, который не может распознать опасного нарушителя и его сообщников в первый же момент, — бесполезен".

"Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."
languages.original_text: "Только нарушителей Лекс Империалис, их пособников и возможные контакты — их имена, приметы, вероятные логова. Арбитр, который не может распознать опасного нарушителя и его сообщников в первый же момент, — бесполезен".

traits.locale_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is worthless."

"Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is worthless."

"Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

languages.text: “我只会记住那些违背了帝国律法的人，以及他们的同伙和联系人。所有人的名字、长相、潜在藏身处的位置，全烙在我的脑海里。如果哪位法务官无法第一眼分辨出危险的罪犯或他们的同伙，那这个人就是没用的废物。”
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: “我只会记住那些违背了帝国律法的人，以及他们的同伙和联系人。所有人的名字、长相、潜在藏身处的位置，全烙在我的脑海里。如果哪位法务官无法第一眼分辨出危险的罪犯或他们的同伙，那这个人就是没用的废物。”

languages.text: «Solo el de aquellos que han quebrantado la Lex Imperialis, sus cómplices y sus contactos probables: nombres, característica y ubicaciones de posibles escondites. Un Arbitrator incapaz de identificar al instante a criminales peligrosos y a sus socios es inútil».
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: «Solo el de aquellos que han quebrantado la Lex Imperialis, sus cómplices y sus contactos probables: nombres, característica y ubicaciones de posibles escondites. Un Arbitrator incapaz de identificar al instante a criminales peligrosos y a sus socios es inútil».

languages.text: « Seulement ceux qui ont violé la Lex Imperialis, leurs complices et leurs éventuels contacts. Mais je mémorise en effet leur nom, leur apparence et les coordonnées de leurs différentes cachettes. Un arbitrator n'est d'aucune utilité s'il est incapable d'identifier immédiatement un criminel dangereux ou ses associés. »
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement ceux qui ont violé la Lex Imperialis, leurs complices et leurs éventuels contacts. Mais je mémorise en effet leur nom, leur apparence et les coordonnées de leurs différentes cachettes. Un arbitrator n'est d'aucune utilité s'il est incapable d'identifier immédiatement un criminel dangereux ou ses associés. »

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアを犯した者、その協力者、そして接触の可能性がある者のみだが…彼らの名前、特徴、そして潜伏の可能性がある場所を覚えている。危険な犯罪者やその関係者を即座に識別できないアービトレイターなど、無用の存在だ」
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアを犯した者、その協力者、そして接触の可能性がある者のみだが…彼らの名前、特徴、そして潜伏の可能性がある場所を覚えている。危険な犯罪者やその関係者を即座に識別できないアービトレイターなど、無用の存在だ」

languages.text: "Yalnızca Lex İmperialis'i ihlal edenleri, onların suç ortaklarını ve olası irtibatlarının isimlerini, özelliklerini ve olası saklanma yerlerinin konumlarını. Tehlikeli bir suçluyu veya onun ortaklarını anında tanımlayamayan bir Yargıcı, işe yaramazın tekidir."
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca Lex İmperialis'i ihlal edenleri, onların suç ortaklarını ve olası irtibatlarının isimleri, özellikleri ve olası saklanma yerlerinin konumları. Tehlikeli bir suçluyu veya onun ortaklarını anında tanımlayamayan bir Yargıcı, işe yaramazın tekidir."

languages.text: "Nur jene, die das Lex Imperia gebrochen haben, ihre Komplizen und möglichen Kontakte – Namen, Aussehen und Positionen potenzieller Verstecke. Ein Arbitrator, der einen gefährlichen Verbrecher oder seine Spießgesellen nicht unmittelbar identifizieren kann, ist nutzlos."
languages.original_text: "Only those who have violated the Lex Imperialis, their accomplices, and possible contacts — their names, features, and the locations of potential hideouts. An Arbitrator who cannot instantly identify a dangerous criminal or their associates is useless."

traits.locale_text: "Nur jene, die das Lex Imperia gebrochen haben, ihre Komplizen und möglichen Kontakte – Namen, Aussehen und Positionen potenzieller Verstecke. Ein Arbitrator, der einen gefährlichen Verbrecher oder seine Spießgesellen nicht unmittelbar identifizieren kann, ist nutzlos."
